thread.title: Rams offer $1-million prize in 'Guess Our Games' schedule contest
thread.title_full: Rams offer $1-million prize in 'Guess Our Games' schedule contest

author: Gary Klein
title: Rams offer $1-million prize in 'Guess Our Games' schedule contest
text:
Rams offer $1-million prize in 'Guess Our Games' schedule contest Die-hard fans Gina Ferazzi / Los Angeles Times Die-hard Rams fans might want to enter the Guess Our Games contest, which offers a $1-million prize for correctly predicting the week and day for each game on the Rams' 16-game 2017 schedule. Die-hard Rams fans might want to enter the Guess Our Games contest, which offers a $1-million prize for correctly predicting the week and day for each game on the Rams' 16-game 2017 schedule. (Gina Ferazzi / Los Angeles Times) Gary Klein under first-year Coach Sean McVay.
The odds are even longer for a fan to correctly predict the Rams’ schedule before the NFL releases it in April. 
As part of a Guess Our Games contest, the Rams are offering a $1-million prize for correctly picking the week and day of each of the 16 regular-season games, and the bye week, the team announced Wednesday. 
The Rams staged a similar contest in 2014 and offered a $100,000 prize. There was no winner, but the Rams awarded season tickets to a man who finished with an accuracy rate just above 67% as well as two other entrants, according to team’s website. 
The Rams play road games against the Seahawks, 49ers, Cardinals, Dallas Cowboys , Jacksonville Jaguars , Minnesota Vikings , New York Giants and Tennessee Titans . 
The contest is open to participants 18 and older and only California residents are eligible to win.
